## Checklists

- [ ] Builds locally: `npm run build`
- [ ] Tests pass: `npx playwright test`
- [ ] Typecheck: `npm run type-check`
- [ ] Lint: `npm run lint`
- [ ] A11y sanity (axe on `/`): `npm run audit:axe`

Anything risky, migrations, or follow-ups to track.
